items.sentence: About how long did it take you to translate this book?
The problem is that Tom doesn't want to sit near Mary.
I think it would be best for you to not do that today.
I want everybody to know I'm not the one who did that.
I wish that I could get Tom to show me how to do that.
Did you know that I used to teach French in Australia?
Tom could hear the sound of laughter through the wall.
This caterpillar will turn into a beautiful butterfly.
The speed of light is much greater than that of sound.
I don't think that you should worry about it too much.
Tom is in the first percentile for maths in Australia.
How many hours does it take to go to Okinawa by plane?
Tom will almost certainly be late for his appointment.
Tom wondered if Mary knew what she was supposed to do.
Tom aimed his pistol at Mary, but he didn't shoot her.
I don't think that Tom has enough money to retire yet.
Tom said that he'd scale the fish if Mary cooked them.
Tom didn't eat any of the candy that I bought for him.
Tom said that he thought that the wine was quite good.
Tom's teacher said he thought that Tom needed glasses.
